trans-unit.source: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution playbook | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution playbook | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Use the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.
trans-unit.target: Use the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.

trans-unit.source: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution playbook
trans-unit.target: Vehicle telemetry analytics solution playbook

trans-unit.source: This **menu** links to the chapters in this playbook.
trans-unit.target: This **menu** links to the chapters in this playbook.

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Super computers have moved out of the lab and are now parked in our garage!
trans-unit.target: Super computers have moved out of the lab and are now parked in our garage!

trans-unit.source: These cutting-edge automobiles contain a myriad of sensors, giving them the ability to track and monitor millions of events every second.
trans-unit.target: These cutting-edge automobiles contain a myriad of sensors, giving them the ability to track and monitor millions of events every second.

trans-unit.source: We expect that by 2020, most of these cars will be connected to the internet.
trans-unit.target: We expect that by 2020, most of these cars will be connected to the internet.

trans-unit.source: Imagine tapping into this wealth of data to provide best in class safety, reliability and driving experience.
trans-unit.target: Imagine tapping into this wealth of data to provide best in class safety, reliability and driving experience.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft has made this imagination a reality via Cortana Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft has made this imagination a reality via Cortana Analytics.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft’s Cortana Analytics is a fully managed big data and advanced analytics suite that enables you to transform your data into intelligent action.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft’s Cortana Analytics is a fully managed big data and advanced analytics suite that enables you to transform your data into intelligent action.

trans-unit.source: We want to introduce you to the Cortana Analytics Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Solution Template.
trans-unit.target: We want to introduce you to the Cortana Analytics Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Solution Template.

trans-unit.source: This solution demonstrates how car dealerships, automobile manufacturers and insurance companies can use the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.
trans-unit.target: This solution demonstrates how car dealerships, automobile manufacturers and insurance companies can use the capabilities of Cortana Analytics to gain real-time and predictive insights on vehicle health and driving habits.

trans-unit.source: The solution is implemented as a [lambda architecture pattern](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lambda_architecture) showing the full potential of the Cortana Analytics platform for real-time and batch processing.
trans-unit.target: The solution is implemented as a [lambda architecture pattern](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lambda_architecture) showing the full potential of the Cortana Analytics platform for real-time and batch processing.

trans-unit.source: It includes a Vehicle Telematics simulator, leverages Event Hubs for ingesting millions of simulated vehicle telemetry events into Azure, then uses Stream Analytics for gaining real-time insights on vehicle health and persists that data into long-term storage for richer batch analytics.
trans-unit.target: It includes a Vehicle Telematics simulator, leverages Event Hubs for ingesting millions of simulated vehicle telemetry events into Azure, then uses Stream Analytics for gaining real-time insights on vehicle health and persists that data into long-term storage for richer batch analytics.

trans-unit.source: It takes advantage of Machine Learning for anomaly detection in real-time and batch processing to gain predictive insights.
trans-unit.target: It takes advantage of Machine Learning for anomaly detection in real-time and batch processing to gain predictive insights.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight is leveraged to transform data at scale, and Data Factory handles orchestration, scheduling, resource management and monitoring of the batch processing pipeline.
trans-unit.target: HDInsight is leveraged to transform data at scale, and Data Factory handles orchestration, scheduling, resource management and monitoring of the batch processing pipeline.

trans-unit.source: Finally, Power BI gives this solution a rich dashboard for real-time data and predictive analytics visualizations.
trans-unit.target: Finally, Power BI gives this solution a rich dashboard for real-time data and predictive analytics visualizations.

trans-unit.source: Architecture
trans-unit.target: Architecture

trans-unit.source: ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry/fig1-vehicle-telemetry-annalytics-solution-architecture.png) *Figure 1 – Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Solution Architecture*
trans-unit.target: ![](./media/cortana-analytics-playbook-vehicle-telemetry/fig1-vehicle-telemetry-annalytics-solution-architecture.png) *Figure 1 – Vehicle Telemetry Analytics Solution Architecture*

trans-unit.source: This solution includes the following **Cortana Analytics components** and showcases their end to end integration
trans-unit.target: This solution includes the following **Cortana Analytics components** and showcases their end to end integration

trans-unit.source: **Event Hubs** for ingesting millions of vehicle telemetry events into Azure.
trans-unit.target: **Event Hubs** for ingesting millions of vehicle telemetry events into Azure.

trans-unit.source: **Stream Analytics** for gaining real-time insights on vehicle health and persists that data into long-term storage for richer batch analytics.
trans-unit.target: **Stream Analytics** for gaining real-time insights on vehicle health and persists that data into long-term storage for richer batch analytics.

trans-unit.source: **Machine Learning** for anomaly detection in real-time and batch processing to gain predictive insights.
trans-unit.target: **Machine Learning** for anomaly detection in real-time and batch processing to gain predictive insights.

trans-unit.source: **HDInsight** is leveraged to transform data at scale
trans-unit.target: **HDInsight** is leveraged to transform data at scale

trans-unit.source: **Data Factory** handles orchestration, scheduling, resource management and monitoring of the batch processing pipeline.
trans-unit.target: **Data Factory** handles orchestration, scheduling, resource management and monitoring of the batch processing pipeline.

trans-unit.source: **Power BI** gives this solution a rich dashboard for real-time data and predictive analytics visualizations.
trans-unit.target: **Power BI** gives this solution a rich dashboard for real-time data and predictive analytics visualizations.

trans-unit.source: This solution accesses two different **data sources**:
trans-unit.target: This solution accesses two different **data sources**:

trans-unit.source: **Simulated vehicle signals and diagnostics**: A vehicle telematics simulator emits diagnostic information and signals that correspond to the state of the vehicle and the driving pattern at a given point in time.
trans-unit.target: **Simulated vehicle signals and diagnostics**: A vehicle telematics simulator emits diagnostic information and signals that correspond to the state of the vehicle and the driving pattern at a given point in time.

trans-unit.source: **Vehicle catalog**: A reference dataset containing a VIN to model mapping.
trans-unit.target: **Vehicle catalog**: A reference dataset containing a VIN to model mapping.
